items.content_html: JTDBot is a versatile and lightweight Discord bot that comes with a variety of features, including music playback, GPT integration, moderation tools, and much more! Whether you're managing a community or just want a fun bot for your server, JTDBot has something for everyone.

Whether you're managing a community or just want a fun bot for your server, JTDBot has something for everyone.

items.content_html: ✍️ Medium-Like Blogging Application: A full-featured blogging platform inspired by Medium. 🛠️ Tech Stack: Frontend: React and Tailwind CSS for a sleek, responsive UI. Backend: Honō (Cloudflare Workers) for lightweight, serverless logic. Database: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM and connection pooling. 🚀 Features: 📝 Rich blogging functionality
items.title: shubhampawar4841/Medium: ✍️ Medium-Like Blogging Application: A full-featured blogging platform inspired by Medium.  🛠️ Tech Stack:  Frontend: React and Tailwind CSS for a sleek, responsive UI.  Backend: Honō (Cloudflare Workers) for lightweight, serverless logic.  Database: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM and connection pooling.   🚀 Features:  📝 Rich blogging functionality

items.content_html: QuickUI is a lightweight frontend framework. Supports data binding, i18n support, event binding, conditional rendering, and loop rendering. Helps developers quickly build efficient and flexible web.

items.content_html: FlexPlyr is a modular player that supports YouTube, Vimeo, as well as local video and audio files. It allows customization of control button types, arrangement, and optional panel styles.
